full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM SHOD RGYAL CHEN KARMA 'PHRIN LAS LA GSOL MCHOD MDOR BSDUS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(ZHES DAM SHOD RGYAL CHEN KARMA 'PHRIN LAS LA MCHOD GTOR 'BUL TSUL RGYAS PA ZHIG DGOS ZHES MCHOD DPON NGAG DBANG SHES RAB KYIS BSKUL BA LTAR ^ ZA HOR GYI BANDES SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DPAL LDAN SNGAGS RAMS PA'O, ,CES DAM SHOD KARMA 'PHRIN LAS KYI GSOL MCHOD 'DI NYID RGYAL MCHOG LNGA PA CHEN PO'I @005B GSUNG GZHIR GZHAG ,KHRI CHEN BSTAN PA RAB RGYAS KYI GSUNG SOGS NAS KHA SKONG STE, ^ SKYABS MGON RJE BTZUN DAM PA MCHOG GI BKA' STZAL SPYI BOR MNOS STE, ^ YON 'DZIN MKHAN PO NO MONG HAN SPRUL MING BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN CHOS 'PHEL GYIS RAB GUS DVANG CHEN POS SBYAR STE BUL, SA MA RGYA RGYA RGYA, DGE'O, ,)
